content.text:
Hello! I'm ready to help you explore the codebase and design implementation plans.

I can see we're in a Tauri desktop application project at `/Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent/packages/desktop/src-tauri`.

To get started, let me understand the project structure better:

<bash>
ls -la /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent/packages/desktop/src-tauri
</bash>

<bash>
find /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent/packages/desktop/src-tauri -type f -name "*.rs" -o -name "*.toml" -o -name "*.json" | head -20
</bash>

<bash>
cat /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent/packages/desktop/src-tauri/Cargo.toml
</bash>

I'm ready to help you explore this Rust-based Tauri application and design implementation plans. What would you like me to help you with?

Some things I can do:
- Explore the current architecture and code organization
- Understand existing patterns and conventions
- Design implementation approaches for new features
- Identify critical files and dependencies
- Create detailed step-by-step implementation plans

Just let me know what requirements or features you'd like me to investigate and plan for!
